DOC.brief_summary: Background : Asymmetrical foot posture influence pelvic girdle stability might give pain pelvic region . The objective investigate foot manipulation correct foot asymmetry relieve pregnancy relate pelvic girdle pain ( PPGP ) shorten sick leave period . Design : Randomized single blind ( patient evaluator ) clinical trial compare foot sham manipulation 6 weekly treatment session . Setting : Five physiotherapy out-patient clinic ( 10 physiotherapist ) Skaraborg Primary Care , Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: Foot Manipulation Pregnancy Related Pelvic Girdle Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The study perform physiotherapy clinic five Health Care Centres Skaraborg September 2009 August 2011 . Women suspect PPGP refer midwifes physician contact physiotherapist directly . Inclusion criteria Swedish-speaking woman gestational week 12-31 PPGP determine specific provocation test , include 4P test ( posterior pelvic pain provocation test ) , Patrick ` test , ASLR ( active straight leg raise test ) , modify Trendelenburg test palpation symphysis pubis . Women twin pregnancy , lumbar pain , rheumatic serious disease exclude well non-Swedish-speaking woman foot manipulation earlier . The foot inspect stand position estimate whether straight , rotate outwards inwards load flat , pronate supinate . Movement subtalar joint investigate well elasticity tarsal bone lateral malleoli . All woman include asymmetric position one foot . Study procedure Patients randomize either foot sham manipulation use seal envelope ( n=150 ; 75 treatment ) . The envelope administer mixed centrally depend size physiotherapy clinic assign appropriate number envelope . Ten physiotherapist participate pair-wise treatment , one treat patient ( physiotherapist unblinded , patient blind ) , make evaluation ( double blind ) . All patient get information PPGP 6 visit week 6 week , follow-up visit one week end treatment three month delivery . All patient encourage talk pregnant woman evaluator detail treatment . Data register protocol separate medical record , accessible evaluator , include group assignment , result diagnostic test , Vorlauf test Visual Analogue Scales ( VAS ) . The blinded evaluator administer follow-up three month delivery .
DOC.criteria: Women suspect PPGP refer midwifes physician contact physiotherapist directly . Inclusion criterion : Swedishspeaking woman gestational week 1231 Pregnancy Related Pelvic Girdle Pain ( PPGP ) determine provocation test ( 4P test , posterior pelvic pain provocation test ; Patrick ` test , ASLR ( active straight leg raise test ) , modify Trendelenburg test pain palpation symphysis pubis Women : twin pregnancy lumbar pain rheumatic serious disease nonSwedishspeaking woman experinced foot manipulation earlier
